metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39948 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
eprosima Fast DDS is a C++ implementation of the Data Distribution Service standard of the Object Management Group. Prior to versions 2.10.0 and 2.6.5, the `BadParamException` thrown by Fast CDR is not caught in Fast DDS. This can remotely crash any Fast DDS process. Versions 2.10.0 and 2.6.5 contain a patch for this issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fastdds-tools - 2.9.1+ds-1ubuntu0.1
libfastrtps2.9 - 2.9.1+ds-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fastdds package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.1+ds-1ubuntu0.1').
